snippet: Eight hip-hop dance crews competed in the McDonald’s B-Boy Royale on Saturday, most of them comprising Asian-American performers.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews performances as part of the McDonald's B-Boy Royale at the New York University Skirball Center for the Performing Arts, inaugural break dancing competition between eight hip-hop crews.
lead_paragraph: Eight hip-hop dance crews competed in the McDonald’s B-Boy Royale on Saturday, most of them comprising Asian-American performers.

headline.seo: McDonald’s B-Boy Royale Break-Dancing at the Skirball Center
headline.main: Eclipsing a Fast-Food Clown With Beats and Break-Dancing
headline.print_headline: Eclipsing a Fast-Food Clown With Beats and Break-Dancing
